resources.string: A collection of easy to use specific calculators designed, written, and maintained by students at Brigham Young University - Idaho

To the fullest extent allowed by law, this software comes with no warranty, either express or implied. By installing and/or using this software you agree to hold harmless Brigham Young University - Idaho and its sponsors, employees, and students.
We created the logo and icons for Calc360 using the free tools at logomakr.com
Thank you for using Calc360! Due to the experimental nature of this calculator, we would appreciate any comments, questions, or recommendations in order to further improve this application.
You can contact us through the Google Play Store or by clicking this link: linknamehere.com
Well, this is embarrassing. Something is wrong with this calculator, and it isn\'t working. We apologize.
The currency exchange rates are courtesy of the European Central Bank.
